alert.note: Alert for Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 7:33PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern New London, southeastern New Haven and southern Middlesex Counties through 815 PM EDT... At 732 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Guilford, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New London, Guilford, Colchester, Clinton, Old Saybrook, Salem, Chester, Branford, Waterford, East Lyme, East Haddam, Haddam, Old Lyme, Westbrook and Killingworth. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Northern Middlesex; Northern New London; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London
